update.releaseNotes:
v1.5.0 - Changelog
New --- - Update data up to the Battle Trajectory selection pack.
Changed --- - Lower font size to 8px for the MessageLog component. - Brought over changes and improvements from GIS project. - Various changes for log messages. - Reduce delay before beginning operations by 1 second.
Fixed --- - Fix AccessibilityService not waiting for the actual gesture to finish.
